name: KingdomzIO
description:
Kingdomz.io is a browser puzzle game that you can play with your friends!

The game consists of vertical and horizontal lines, which form a grid. Players then take turns selecting a line. If you are the player to place the last line that creates a square, you claim the square and get a point. The player with the most points is the winner!

The game supports different gamemodes & boosers!
